answers.answer: I actually had to do the 24 hour urine test at 25 weeks, it wasn't bad. I hated peeing in the toilet hat thing. It's for preeclampsia and they just want to make sure everything is ok. Im right on the border so they have continued to monitor me, I wouldn't freak out too much. Watch your sodium intake and rest as much as you can! You are so close tho if u do have a lot of protein in ur urine they will probably watch u very very closely or induce at 37
Ok that is actually good to hear I was just worried because I don't want anything to happen to him or me....and I hate that hat thing to it's beyond annoying lol

question: So today my doctors office sent me over to get blood work done at the hospital because they found Protein in my urine everything came back good but they want me to do a 24hr urine test which will help them make the decision to induce me or let me go full term I'm currently 36 weeks and 5 days has anyone else experienced this should I be worried???
title: Stressed Out!!
